concept.title: 29.401-2 Construction contracts performed in North Carolina.

conbody.p: The contracting officer shall insert the clause at 52.229-2 , North Carolina State and Local Sales and Use Tax, in solicitations and contracts for construction to be performed in North Carolina. If the requirement is for vessel repair to be performed in North Carolina, the clause shall be used with its AlternateI.
